                                                 java.util.List<LayoutToken> tokenizations)
        Post processing of extracted field affiliation and address. Here the input string to be processed comes from a previous parser: the segmentation can be kept and we filter in all tokens labelled
        or . We also need to keep the original tokenization information to recreate the exact initial string.
